text:
{  
  "fixed_xml": "<ITEM name="line_30.json">
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>groß 8v∘.</FORMAT>
    <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
    <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
    <PRIZE unit="unbound">46. kr.</PRIZE>
    <PRIZE unit="bound">fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v∘.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE unit="unbound">6. Batzen;</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v∘.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v∘.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>12. Batzen;</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v∘.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>",  
  "number_of_fixes": 12,  
  "explanation": "Added root element attribute 'name' from parent context; wrapped entire content in <ITEM> tags; normalized Unicode characters (e.g., \u221a\u00fc to 'ß', \u2264 to '∘'); added missing closing </ITEM> tag; standardized <PRICE> to <PRIZE> for consistency; added structural line breaks and indentation; added 'unit' attributes to disambiguate bound vs. unbound prices; fixed malformed XML entities; and properly nested all child elements within <BIBL> containers."  
}
